languages.text: "Отлично. У гордого зверя должно быть гордое имя! Знающие, услышав его, преисполнятся еще большего почтения к то{mf|му|й}, кто властвует над стихией".
"Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."
languages.original_text: "Отлично. У гордого зверя должно быть гордое имя! Знающие, услышав его, преисполнятся еще большего почтения к то{mf|му|й}, кто властвует над стихией".

traits.locale_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “太棒了！如此高傲的猛兽，就应该取个高傲的名字！若是有识之士听到了这个名字，一定会对这场狂风的主人肃然起敬。”
languages.original_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."

traits.locale_text: “太棒了！如此高傲的猛兽，就应该取个高傲的名字！若是有识之士听到了这个名字，一定会对这场狂风的主人肃然起敬。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「素晴らしい。誇り高き動物には、誇り高き名前がふさわしいもの！知識ある人々がその名を聞いたら、この自然の力を解き放った者にさらに大きな敬意を抱くでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい。誇り高き動物には、誇り高き名前がふさわしいもの！知識ある人々がその名を聞いたら、この自然の力を解き放った者にさらに大きな敬意を抱くでしょうね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Excelente. ¡Un animal orgulloso merece un nombre orgulloso! La gente que entienda del asunto oirá su nombre y sentirá un respeto aún mayor por quien ha capturado semejante fuerza de la naturaleza».
languages.original_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."

traits.locale_text: «Excelente. ¡Un animal orgulloso merece un nombre orgulloso! La gente que entienda del asunto oirá su nombre y sentirá un respeto aún mayor por quien ha capturado semejante fuerza de la naturaleza».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Parfait. Un nom aussi fier que l'animal qui le porte ! En l'entendant, les gens instruits ressentiront un respect plus fort encore pour la personne qui a réussi à dompter cette force de la nature. »
languages.original_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."

traits.locale_text: « Parfait. Un nom aussi fier que l'animal qui le porte ! En l'entendant, les gens instruits ressentiront un respect plus fort encore pour la personne qui a réussi à dompter cette force de la nature. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ausgezeichnet. Ein stolzes Tier verdient einen stolzen Namen! Hören Leute ihren Namen, die wissen, was sie ist, werden sie noch größeren Respekt vor Euch haben, da Ihre diese Naturgewalt an die Kette gelegt habt."
languages.original_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."

traits.locale_text: "Ausgezeichnet. Ein stolzes Tier verdient einen stolzen Namen! Hören Leute ihren Namen, die wissen, was sie ist, werden sie noch größeren Respekt vor Euch haben, da Ihre diese Naturgewalt an die Kette gelegt habt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Harika. Gururlu bir hayvanın gururlu bir ismi olmalı! Bilgi sahibi kimseler, bu ismi duyduklarında bu doğa harikasına tasma takmayı başaran kişiye daha da büyük saygı besleyecektir."
languages.original_text: "Excellent. A proud animal deserves a proud name! Knowledgeable people will hear the name and feel even greater respect for the one who has leashed this force of nature."

traits.locale_text: "Harika. Gururlu bir hayvanın gururlu bir ismi olmalı! Bilgi sahibi olanlar bu ismi duyduklarında, bu doğa harikasına tasma takmayı başaran kişiye daha da büyük saygı besleyeceklerdir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
